name: aMaze of Silence
description:
You find yourself on an island. A man is looking for help to save his sister. Will you be the one to go on this short heroic quest. But first you will have to go through different mazes.

System Requirements:

OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more Storage: 100 MB available space
